entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING
..WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY

entry.data:
SHOWERS, BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
